attributes.action: Stop private parking companies profiting from fines at hospitals covid.
attributes.additional_details:
Wait times have in creased during the pandemic. Companies should not be profiting from extended stays at hospitals.

Issuing fines adds extra stress to already upset patient or family member. Especially when they have no control how long they will be there for.
attributes.background: Stop private companies from profiting from fines at hospitals during and start of the outbreak of Covid 19.

rejection.details:
Car parking is a matter for individual hospital trusts.

The Government has funded hospital car parking for NHS staff during the Covid-19 pandemic. You could start a petition calling for the Government to fund hospital parking for all users for this period.
